description: Defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, managing various application-wide exceptions and returning structured error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot ControllerAdvice class that globally handles exceptions and returns standardized error responses.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Constructs a structured error response map containing timestamp, status, error, and message.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles BadRequestException and returns a 400 Bad Request response.

methods.name: handleUnprocessable
methods.description: Handles UnprocessableEntityException and returns a 422 Unprocessable Entity response.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors (MethodArgumentNotValidException) and returns a 400 Bad Request with validation message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 Internal Server Error.
